1.content:
What's the setting of our story?

Are we in...

The present -- Set somewhere in the span of the show, with the men we knew when we knew them. The gain can include, but is certainly not limited to, Leo, Cole, Agent Brody, Darryl, Andy, Dan, Victor, Jason, etc...

The future -- For as many times as they came back to change it, now it's your turn! Wyatt and Chris, older versions of the present men, new characters if you want.

The past -- Look into past lives, visit characters they've seen or make up new ones.

An alternate universe -- want to change some key part of the sister's lives, their relationships, or who they are? This is the choice.
1.title: When, where and who?

11.content:
What's Happening?

Leo never really shook off the Sloth spell.

Cole, post-Phoebe, seeks a new source of fun.

After his breakup with Piper, Dan lets himself go a little. Maybe a lot.

Somebody else gets bigger.
11.title: The Present

choices: the food delivery guy shows up unbidden.
113.content:
Dan sat slumped on the couch for the third day in a row. He flipped through the channels aimlessly and settled on a movie marathon, even though he'd seen all of them before. "At least the food is good," he said to nobody in particular as he grabbed more of the fries that had been delivered.

Guys working in construction don't exactly get paid leave, but Dan had the money saved to take a little time between jobs, and after his breakup with Piper, he decided to use it. He'd been dumped for somebody using a stolen identity, then discovered magic was real by being turned 80-years-old. If anyone deserved a vacation, it was him, and it was now.

It had already been two weeks, in fact. Dan hadn't left the house much, except to pick up groceries and necessities. He also hadn't exercised much. He'd never had cause to before, with his work being almost solely physical labor. He was definitely muscular across his 6' frame. And though a picture might not have showed a difference, he could feel one. There was padding all over -- he felt softer, and everytime he stuffed himself by ordering too much food, his belly relaxed and he fell asleep happy.

He'd put on a total of 10 lbs without trying, or caring. It was then that...
113.title: Dan

choices: He calls Piper to send another plate
He tires to resist the urge of the food.
1131.content:
He saw a puff of a small white cloud in front of him and it was a big white plate. the big white plate had a note on it and knew that had to be Piper's hand writing. The note read: " Dan I know you are going through a lot and that I don't know if you and I will see each other in the future but, to make it up to you a sent you a plate to brings you a supply of endless amounts of food. All you have to do is call out the name of the food and eat it also be very careful some of the foods are really fattening on the bright side it will not harm your health. Love Piper" P.S. the plate will need two hours to recharge after a use and that all your clothes will grow if you may gain weight.

"All right I will give it a try" he said to nobody again. 'Cookies" and a small puff of white cloud to big cookies the size of his palm appeared. Grabbing one and taking a bite it was like a taste of heaven and quickly eating the rest and the other cookie.

Thoughts of foods crept in his mind of all the food and money he will save.
1131.title: something magical happens.

114.content:
Another group of characters

Andy is laid off and has depression.

Coop has to be fat for a new power

More characters
114.title: Another

choices: A Few More Years, A Few More pounds
12.content:
What's going on?

Chris returns to the future to find that Wyatt has indeed changed. Chris debates whether he changed the future too much.

The show talked a lot about Chris and Wyatt in their 20s, and as babies, but what about the inbetween? Chris and Wyatt are in high school, with full powers and a desire to... play.

In the future, sibling rivalry has taken on a new shape. The brothers try to get back at each other in new ways, even when demons get in the middle.

Check in with the characters we knew, a little bit older.
12.title: The Future

121.content:
Chris is anxious, standing in front of the portal to take him home. They'd stopped Gideon, saved his brother, it even seemed like his parents would be getting back together. Chris took a deep breath and stepped through the portal.

On the other side, the attic doesn't seem to have changed. A few pieces of furniture have been rearranged; the book is thicker, even than it was when he left. Chris walks a few steps forward into the room, still clutching his return potion tight in his hands. He walks forward a few steps and notices something feels different. He looks down and sees that...
121.title: Back to the Fat Future

choices: Chris decides to try one out.
1212.content:
Chris realizes how nervous he is when stepping on a pilow sets him on edge. He decides to investigate, carefuly, starting with the book. He pockets the potion and picks up the book. The dark pages in the book are gone, which is a good sign. At the back, however, there's a new section. Several spells are written in a handwriting he doesn't recognize, others in his own handwriting.

The surprising part is the purpose of the spells. Instead of the demon vanquishing spells usually there, this new section is full of incapacitating spells. Not just for demons, either.

There are fattening spells, hunger spells, metabolism spells and desire spells. While this whole section is weird for Chris, the weirdest part is the larger portion of them are in his own handwriting.
1212.title: he's stepping on a pillow.

12121.content:
The demon trapping spell seems the most interesting. Chris decides to try it out. He orbs down to the underworld. He's in a non-descript cave. The usual band of muscular, unkempt men are gathered around a fire.

'At least they don't have weird teeth or skin,' he thinks.

Chris stands up and draws their attention.

"End these demon's hope to be slimmer,
Make 'em so fat they can't shimmer."

The demons topple over. As though it was being poured into them, they begin getting fatter. Bellies grow first, swelling up and then out, over the crotch and across the ground. Their legs grow chubbier and slide together. Their faces grow fatter too.

The weird thing is, they're smiling. Almost laughing.

The inflation completes, and then...
12121.title: Chris decides to try one out.

121211.content:
There's something strange about Wyatt's orbs. It seems slower, and larger. When Wyatt materializes, Chris realizes why. He's 250 lbs, at least! He's even holding fast food and watching the demons inflate with laughter.

"Hey, Chris, I thought we agreed to always do that spell toge--"

Wyatt finally looks at Chris and stops.

"What happened to you?"
"What happened to me, what happened to you? You're huge!"
"Yeah, and you're not!"
"What do you mean?"
"Chris, I saw you this morning. You were bigger than me! Did a spell backfire or something?"
"What? No. I just came back from the past and -- why would a spell backfiring make me skinny?"
Wyatt eyed Chris suspiciously. "Where are the creaky steps at the Manor?"
Chris paused. "Uh, three from the top at the attic, four from the main hallway, and every third one going down into the basement. Wait, unless Dad fixed the one by the attic."
Wyatt continued eyeing Chris suspiciously, and began slowly circling, which almost involved waddling. "Okay, so if you're a shapeshifter you're bad at it, but you know the manor."
"I'm not a demon," Chris protested, "I'm just from the past. Or, from a different future by way of the past."
"Wait... what?"
"I had to go back to stop Gideon from turning you evil."
Wyatt let down his guard and laughed.
"I know man, I'm just messing with you."
"Oh thank God. So why glamour yourself fat?"
Wyatt laughed. "Oh, this isn't a glamour. It's just fun. Now let's get you back to... you."
Wyatt grabbed his brother's hand and orbed them back to the Manor kitchen, where Chris was rather shocked to see himself sitting at the table, eating ice cream. A 300 lb version of himself.
"What? How?"
Fat Chris explained. "Well, Aunt Phoebe told us you'd be coming back soon. And from what she told us about her trip to the future, it sounded like you'd take the place of whatever Chris was already here, in the different future. I didn't want to lose the brother I know, so we changed his identity. That way, when you came back, you came back as yourself."
"That... makes sense, actually."
Fat Chris smiled and kept eating his ice cream.
"Nothing else does, however."

Wyatt sat down at the table and indicated for skinny Chris to do the same. He then conjured a large plate of brownies and started in.

"Why are you guys so fat?"
"Tactful as ever," Fat Chris said.
"Oh leave you alone. He's just surprised everything's changed so much. Here, this'll help."
"Brother from another time,
Lost in his different rhyme,
show him the ropes of this clime."

Skinny Chris glowed, and when the light disappated,
121211.title: Wyatt orbs in.

choices: "Let's take this one step at a time."
"Sure! What's the fastest way to match you guys?"
1212112.content:
Skinny Chris grabbed the bowl of ice cream from his fat self and started shovelling into his mouth, then pouring when the spoon wasn't fast enough. He finished the bowl off in seconds, and eyed the rest of the kitchen hungrily. The remainder of the burgers and fries from Wyatt's fast food were sitting on the island -- he demolished them in record time. Still feeling strangely starving, but now able to resist for a moment, he managed a question of Wyatt between bites.

"What... did you... do... to me?"

"Sorry Chris."

Wyatt looks legitimately sorry, but also vaguely entertained that this is happening.

"I just meant for you to be caught up on what has changed since you came back. But you know the rules, you'll just have to see it through until the spell completes."

With the fast food demolished, Chris moved on to the gallon container of ice cream his fat counterpart had left out. Like the bowl, he scooped and then poured into his mouth. He got surprisingly little of the food on himself, given the speed he was going.

It didn't even take a time-lapse camera to see Chris's stomach steadily stretching to fill the food. He grabbed a container of store-bought cookies, opened them, and finished them off in just two minutes. The light came again, and dissapated, and Chris sat down, collapsed rather, into a chair. He groaned; his stomach was overstuffed and stretched. He looked a couple months pregnant with the bloating.

Wyatt and Fat Chris helped him to the couch to relax. Fat Chris sat along side him on the couch, rubbing his belly. It totally changed the sensation from discomfort to relaxing warmth. Chris started to breathe easier, and was now enjoying the sensations of being full. The world grew fuzzy around him and he focused only on the warmth of his belly. He moaned a little.

"I see you're getting it." Wyatt said.
"It's still weird," said skinny Chris, watching his own hands massage his body, "but I see the appeal."
"So... do you want to catch up?"
1212112.title: he was HUNGRY.

choices: Wyatt casts a spell to stretch imagination.
12122.content:
Wyatt walks into the attic, and Chris doesn't know what to react to first. The Wyatt he left in the future was wild, with crazy hair and ripped to the 9s. This Wyatt is, well, the opposite. His hair is shortcropped and the same light blonde he had as a toddler, he's wearing all normal colored clothes, and most noticeably...

He's 300 lbs.

Wyatt is wearing a t-shirt, but at his size, it leaves nothing to the imagination. His belly, his whole body is wide, and the shirt is particularly stretched around his manboobs.

"Hey, little brother."

Chris didn't know what to say. He had thought, many times, about what changing the future might do. How making Wyatt good might reshape the world. He hadn't thought too much about how it would reshape Wyatt. It clearly had. Wyatt looked over at the Book of Shadows and saw the page it was open to.

"Hey, did you finally come around? You want to join me on the fun side?"
"What do you mean?"

Wyatt slapped his belly and smiled. "I mean getting huge."
"What are you talking about?"
12122.title: Wyatt walks in.

121222.content:
"You've been fighting me on this for years. It's time you understood me."
"Let Mind and Body Soar
To Heights not
reached before
Let limits stretch
That you may catch
A new truth
to explore."

A light comes over Chris, and when it passes, he...
121222.title: Wyatt casts a spell to stretch imagination.

choices: offered to Chris, who couldn't resist.
1212222.content:
Just like when Paige cast it, the stretching spell is literal. This time around, however, it's width that gets stretched. Chris feels his midsection grow first, so quickly he falls on the pillow he just stepped on. His shirt gets tighter and rips as he passes 180, 200 lbs, and his jeans pull apart at the side seams, barely held in place by a few threads.

When he tries to get up, those few threads give way and the jeans fall. Chris doesn't let it get in the way of yelling as his brother.

"What did you do?"

Chris moves his jaw again. Even talking feels different with a sudden extra 50 lbs on his body.

"I'm tired of you not understanding why I like the fun side... I thought this might help you come around."

Chris debates for a moment whether he should throw the return potion and try to change Wyatt from the past again. But, all things considered, fat is a major step up from evil. Chris decides to give his brother a chance.

"Help me up." Chris puts up a hand that Wyatt takes and yanks him up to standing. Chris is surprised by Wyatt's strength -- his body certainly conceals its muscle. Standing at his new weight, Chris feels the girth of it. His uncomfortably tight clothes outline his newly sensitive skin. Everything is rubbing something else, and it all feels a bit... sensual. He stops himself.

"All right, now change me back."
"You know that's not how this works. The spell will run its course."
"What's the end of this one, then?"
"When you understand why I gain weight on purpose."
"You what?"

"C'mon Chris, we've been over this. I like the feeling of fullness, and the way my body feels and looks. And I wish you would accept that."
"That-- that is never going to happen."

No sooner had Chris spoken the words than the light around him reappeared. He felt a flush again, a smaller version of before, and he felt himself get ever so slightly heavier -- 5 lbs, about. Not a huge amount, but enough to push his jeans beyond their limits and drop them to the floor. Chris, now standing there in a tshirt riding up a belly and underwear strained at every elastic seam, glared at Wyatt. Wyatt just laughed, and said "I'm hungry. You?"

Chris said no, but the moment he did, his stomach growled and he felt starving. He was going to have to learn to keep his mouth shut if he wanted to make it through this. He followed Wyatt to the kitchen, which looked very different. The kitchen Chris had left had been half potion ingredients, half gourmet ingredients and cooking tools. This one seemed to replace both categories entirely with junk food. Wyatt opened up a bag of potato chips and
1212222.title: is huge.

He see the woman are having male feeding contest.

A demon appears and throw energy balls and Chris. The book of shadows projects itself and Chris with a blue force field. Then sudden the demon exploded and there was an athame. He looked and saw it was Bianca who threw it. She wore a long black party dress.

"We should go see them as you know your uncle Cole and uncle Coop can get very hungry when waiting since there pretty on the hefty side" said Bianca as they let the Attic.
The go down the stairs and Chris notices...

people that love the sister

He is every handsome young man with many admirers. He is starting his fourth to last year at the magic school. He bonded with his father when both of them work out together, but he has been starting on his aunt’s many spared baked goodies in the house. He inherited the powers of spell casting, potion making, mediumship, scrying, telekinesis, super strength, energy ball throwing, healing, shimmering, high resistance, illusion casting, sensing, sleep induction, banishing, mind control, portal creation, incineration, conjuration, regeneration, energy waves and literary manipulation. His parents were worried as he gained many powers that are demon in nature, but they dismissed that when he showed sign of being a mom’s boy. He is dating a young gypsy named Sabrina who has the powers of spell casting, potion making, mediumship, divination, telekinesis, and blinking. She has black hair and dark blue eyes. She is working part time at Phoebe’s bookstore.
12123111.title: Information on Chris cousin/siblings part 2

121231111.content:
Henry became a part time police officer and part time demon hunter. He also help mentor young whiterlighters. He enjoys hunting for evil doers in the magical world. He also likes to help turn mortal criminal lives around into helpful citizens. With his active lifestyle, he works out with Coop, but he is falling prey to Piper’s cooking. He appeared to the Marks family and told what happen to the couple son. The couple accept him as one of their sons. The Marks family grew very close with Henry Paige and the Charmed ones. The Marks brother enjoy hanging out with their new brother and the Henry’s new parents are proud of their son sacrifice and having a charmed one as a daughter in law. Since the fusion and his life style, he has a large bodybuilder body built with strong arms and legs and chiseled abs, but the gift of fatherhood cause him to add nice fatty padding to his firm muscles. He lost his abs and gained a muscle gut, lost some definition on his legs and arms. Paige likes the fatty padding as it make cuddling more enjoyable. He gained the powers of spell casting, potion making, scrying, mediumship, orbing, omnilingualism , sensing, healing, high resistance, telekinesis, telekinetic orbing, invisibility, cloaking, force field generation, thermokinesis , photokinesis, hovering, regeneration, portal creation, and electrokinesis. Paige enjoys her new elemental powers from her past life. Using her new power allow her to help more witch charges and future whitelighters. She also help at the magic school as a recruiter and as a teacher to whitelighters. She enjoys kick demon butt, her family, and spending time with her mountain of a man husband Henry. Paige eldest daughters are a set of twins. Tamora Peggy and Kit Patty Marks. Tamora and Kit both have long curly auburn hair, calming brown eyes and blossoming figures. Both girls took several class in self-defense by their mother. Both are in their second to last year in magic school and want to continue both mortal and magical education. Both girls inherited the powers of spell casting, potion making, scrying, mediumship, force field generation, cloaking, orbing, healing, sensing, and high resistance. Tamaroa has the powers of hydrokinesis, aerokinesis, cryokinesis, electrokinesis, and atmokinesis. Ki has the powers of geokinesis, nature enhancement, pyrokinesis, photokinesis, thermokinesis and fireball throwing. Tamora is dating a young dragon warlock named Lance. His father is Brenden Rowe, who had a son with a dragon sorceress and before he became a priest. Lance wanted to get rid of his evil powers and went to the Charmed ones for help. The Charmed sister cast a spell and turned Lance into a dragon witch, as a side effect from the spell he retained and gained new powers. Lance has the powers of spellcasting, potion making, scrying, flight, fire breathing, super strength, telekinesis, high resistance and fading. With a tall muscular figure, short black hire and dark golden eyes, he acts like a bodyguard and potential future husband to Tamora. The family expects to get married in the future. Kit is dating a young shaman named Gorm. He has a tall yet lean body, blondish brown hair and soothing green eyes. He has the powers of spell casting, scrying, potion making, illusion casting, telepathy, sensing, whirling, healing, and energy ball throwing. He attends the magic school and works part time at Piper’s bakery as a cashier. Paige’s first son and third child, Henry Paxton Marks is starting his third to the last year of magic school. With dark red hair and dark brown eyes and a tall lean body. He loves working out with his dad and help his aunt piper in the kitchen making food. He inherited the powers of spell casting, potion making, scrying, mediumship, orbing, healing, sensing, high resistance, illusion casting, regeneration, invisibility, portal creation, astral projection, telekinetic orbing, and energy ball throwing. He is dating a witch-nymph hybrid named Flora. Flora is beauty young women with sky blue eyes and long wavy harvest color hair and curvy figure. She is in the third las year of mafic school and want to continue her education in mortal college and magical. She has the powers of spell casting, potion making, scrying, mediumship, hovering, nature enchantment, water teleportation, fading, and electrokinesis. She works part time at piper’s restaurant as the hostess. The family to get marred after they finish their education. Paige’s last child is Philip Kyle Marks. He is starting his fifth year to last at the magic school. With curly brown hair and relaxing blue eyes and tall thin body. He loves hanging out with his sibling and his cousins, working out with dad and help at his aunt phoebe bookstore. He has the powers of spell casting, potion making, scrying, mediumship, orbing, sensing, high resistance, regeneration, thought projection, force field generation, literary manipulation, and energy blasts. He wants to continue his mortal and magical education after school.

Chris held his head as all the information went into his head.

"Chris. i need some help" said a voice. He turned around to face the speaker of the voice and he saw it was
121231111.title: Information on Chris cousin/siblings part 3

choices: write a new spell about weight gain.
call Chris with an existing spell.
122.content:
Wyatt flipped idly through the book of shadows. It was a sunny Saturday afternoon. His normal homework was done at his mother's insistence; his magical homework was done at his Aunt Paige's insistence. He was at a rare confluence of completed work, and he found himself... bored.

He sighed, put away the book and pulled out a smaller, black one. Not nearly as old, or as large, as the book of shadows, but to Wyatt, just as important. A few years ago, Wyatt had started his own spellbook. The book of shadows was a great heirloom to his family but it was... very women-centric. Wyatt thought it might be time to start a new book, himself.

It was full of spells he'd written or borrowed to help with the little things. A few vanquishing spells, a few time stopping spells, a spell for Mr. Right he'd borrowed, just a few assorted spells.

He decided to...
122.title: Wyatt the Teenage Fat Witch

1221.content:
Despite Wyatt's numerous powers, Phoebe never let him relax. She'd spent so much of her life without active powers that she wouldn't let Wyatt rely on his. She kept him exercising and in incredible shape. Wyatt was grateful, for the number of times he'd literally kicked demon ass when his powers weren't enough.

In his 18 years, he'd grown to 6' tall, and his constant work kept him a lean 185 lbs. He had a slim six pack; everything about him was slim.

But man did he like potato chips. And candy. And sweet, salty and fat foods that all his friends eat. Wyatt was the son of not just a witch, but a fantastic professional chef. Delicious foods, most of them unhealthy, were always filling the manor's kitchen. But thanks to catering, supplying charities and cooking for friends, it was never for him.

Wyatt was tired of not being allowed to relax, and he thought that magic should make it right. He decided to write a spell.

"With muscles my family is obsessed
Though with fitness I've been blessed
Aunts who won't get off our backs
Let me eat my fill then body relax."

Lights circled around Wyatt in the usual way. When they disappated, they left behind...
1221.title: write a new spell about weight gain.

choices: "Nope. Gotta finish, go do something else."
12211.content:
Wyatt shrugged. Sometimes magic wasn't meant to work, and maybe this was one of those times. It didn't happen very often. He was the single most powerful witch ever, after all.

He got up and decided to do something else to fill his free time. Wandering down, he saw Chris in the living room and plopped down on the couch next to him. The 16-year-old was about 6 inches shorter, but the same weight as Wyatt. This left a little padding, and when he wore his tighter t-shirts, it showed a little paunch. He was wearing one today.

Chris nodded to acknowledge his brother's appearance.

"Hey did you cast a spell earlier?"
"Yeah, didn't work."
"Well, it didn't work on me too."
"Really? I was pretty sure I only wrote it for me."
"What was it supposed to do?"
"Uh... let me relax."
"Huh?"
"Oh, I'm just tired of working out all the time. I thought I would try a spell to get some relaxation time."
"That is like, complete personal gain. What about the backfire?"
"Well, we'll reverse it if that happens. It was just an experiment. So... what do you want to do?"
"My homework for one."
"But I'm booored. And it's Saturday and you can do it tomorrow."
Chris stopped. And thought.
12211.title: no visible change.

choices: Like all kids, however, they had their secret stash.
conjuring was the first thing they learned at magic school.
122111.content:
"You have a point. So... what do you want to do?"
"I asked you first."
"Fair point," Chris said. "Actually, I'm kinda hungry."
Mentioning it seemed to remind Wyatt. "You know, I am too."

They headed into the kitchen which was, as usual, filled half with food and half with potion ingredients. They were after the food, now.

Between parenting advice and chef expertise, Piper never let potato chips and similarly processed snacks in the house. That had never been a problem for the boys, since...
122111.title: "You have a point."

1221112.content:
Wyatt didn't seem to care about the rules at the moment. With a blink, he covered the kitchen island in food. It always made his brother jealous, so he made sure to make it heavily stocked with Chris's favorite snack foods. There were chips and dip, crackers and cheese, and enormous amounts of soda. As soon as it appeared, however, the glow that had passed over them before returned and they were filled with a ravenous hunger.

Chris dove in first but was only a moment before Wyatt. They ate at superhuman speed, devouring family size bags of chips and pretzels in seconds. It took only minutes before the whole island was covered only in empty wrappers and 2 liter bottles.

The boys suddently came to their senses. And looked down at each other. It looked odd, and obviously magical, that they suddenly had large and round bellies hanging from their front. They were hard, inflated and barely sagged at all. They were also heavy and unwieldy, and the boys had a difficult time navigating into the living room to sit down, where they quickly fell asleep.

When they awoke, things had changed. The bellies were gone, but it seemed as though every ounce of the food they'd consumed was now an ounce of fat, and they had eaten nearly 20 lbs of food a piece. Chris's shirt now betrayed the beginnings of a real belly, was exceptionally tight at the sleeves. He shifted uncomfortably in his pants, now also mercilessly tight. Wyatt seemed to be less affected, but only perhaps because he had more catching up to do.

Chris was the first to speak. "This is your fault, you know. Your spell, your personal gain and your backfire that just had to involve me."
"Come on, Chris. It was your spell last week, and we both got out of it."
"Yeah, but you yelled at me then. Plus I have a date tonight and I am not missing it."
"Oh?"
"Just get to work on the reversal spell."
"Well I would, it's just...
1221112.title: conjuring was the first thing they learned at m...

choices: is overtaken by a new wave of supernatural hunger.
12211122.content:
Chris looks apprehensively at his brother. He can't tell, from the expression, whether Wyatt is being affected by the spell, or just messing with him. It's a problem they frequently have. They used to have a safe word to differentiate, but Wyatt always refused to use it.

Wyatt's eyes flared and he smiled. Chris recognized that look. He'd seen it far too many times. He had only a second before Wyatt took drastic action. Chris decided to orb out. He saw a whole new set of food begin to appear. He...
12211122.title: that was fun."

122111221.content:
Chris disappears to the attic before Wyatt's food fully materializes. He rushes to the Book of Shadows and flips madly looking for a spell that might help. He flips past cadres of demons and summoning spells, and keeps turning, but suddenly the pages start turning on their own. Chris has seen this happen enough to know what to do -- he steps back and waits until the wind settles.

When it does, the spell awaiting him is one he doesn't remember seeing before.

"My sibling's spell for personal gain
Will really only end in pain
As family though, our burden's shared
Even though judgment's been impaired
Release him from his foolish deed
Before he forgets the Wiccan creed."

It makes sense to Chris that generations before would have a sibling spell reversal. He doesn't notice the male pronouns in the spell until too late. He and Wyatt are the first boy witches in the Halliwell line. Which means Wyatt must have written the spell, meaning it's probably a trick.

Chris finishes the last syllable just as he comes to this realization, but it's too late. The usual lights came up through the attic floor and encircled him. When they dissipated, he could suddenly smell all the food two floors below, and it called to him so urgently he orbed there. The piles of food were already half demolished, and Wyatt is sleeping on the couch in the sitting room. This time the food isn't snacks -- there are burgers and fries, lasagna and pizzas -- whole meals are wafting delicious smells throughout the room, as good as if they'd been prepared by Piper herself. But it doesn't matter to Chris, or his appetite. He eats twice as fast, and twice as much, his belly growing to the size and tightness of a fully inflated beach ball before collapsing onto the couch again, passed out.
122111221.title: makes it out in time.

14.content:

(Story 2)How about that the men who married into the family will turn supersized ?

(Story 4)The sisters's power effect their men in their life ?
14.title: Alternate Universe

info.brief_description: The men of Charmed gain weight. Let's be honest, it's mostly by magic.
info.description:
The men of Charmed gain weight. Some witches, some mortals, some demons.

No vore, non-con sex or character death.

Other than that, go for it!
